Body: Possible Duplicate:  How can I recover a deleted file on Android?  I have deleted photos from my samsung galaxy s3 that were saved in my internal sdcard. How can I restore them. All restore applications require USB Mass Storage. How can I turn the internal SDCARD to be recognized as UMS?I am using the android 4.0.4 OS
Title: restore deleted photos on samsung s3 internal sdcard

history.Text: I have deleted photos from my samsung galaxy s3 that were saved in my internal sdcard. How can I restore them. All restore applications require USB Mass Storage. How can I turn the internal SDCARD to be recognized as UMS?I am using the android 4.0.4 OS
restore deleted photos on samsung s3 internal sdcard
